s1.name: Mailing Lists
s1.subtitle: JORAM community
s1.p: For sending questions to the JORAM users and developers community, please post mails to the joram@objectweb.org forum.
But BEFORE, please make sure your question is not already answered in the archives.
For getting in touch with the JORAM development team only (the team also receives and reads the community mails), post mails to joram-team@objectweb.org.
s1.subtitle: EJB users
s1.p: Questions and feedbacks related to using JORAM within JOnAS can also be sent to the JOnAS mailing list, and may also have already been answered in JOnAS archives.
